extension.description: Search plugin for using the cognitive search engine SEMPRIA-Search. Currently, it supports only German texts.

field.name: api_base_url
field.description: Base URL of the SEMPRIA-Search server. It must lead to the root API endpoint.
field.label: SEMPRIA-Search API URL

field.name: api_pw
field.description: Password for accessing your SEMPRIA-Search service.
field.label: SEMPRIA-Search API PW

field.name: corpus
field.description: ID of the corpus that will be searched.
field.label: SEMPRIA-Search Corpus ID

field.name: srp_semp
field.description: Whether semantic links in SEMPRIA-Search results (marked by + and ?) should use SEMPRIA-Search.
field.label: Search links to SEMPRIA-Search

field.name: doc_path
field.description: path for local documents SEMPRIA-Search will lead to on result pages. Only needed when doc path differs from original. Leave blank if unsure.
field.label: Local document path

field.name: api_doc_path
field.description: original path for documents SEMPRIA-Search will lead to on result pages. Only needed, when manually requested. Leave blank if unsure.
field.label: Original document path
